triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core subject of this survey, integrating deep learning with reinforcement learning for end-to-end learning control.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Provides feature representation ability that is integrated with reinforcement learning in DRL systems.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Provides decision-making ability that is combined with deep learning to create DRL systems.

triples.name: Hierarchical reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: A subfield of RL explicitly mentioned as stimulated by deep learning developments.

triples.name: Multi-agent reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: A major subfield of reinforcement learning discussed as an area where DRL addresses challenges in learning control with multiple agents.

triples.name: Imitation learning
triples.relevance: A reinforcement learning subfield mentioned as stimulated by deep learning and addressed in DRL research.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: Foundational algorithm class for policy-based DRL approaches covered in this survey.

triples.name: Q-learning
triples.relevance: Core value-based algorithm fundamental to many DRL methods discussed in the survey.
